summary: 您可以调用ListAddons接口，根据指定地域、集群类型、集群子类型（profile）、集群版本等参数获取可用组件的列表，并查询组件的详细信息，包括组件托管与否、支持的自定义参数Schema、兼容的操作系统架构等。

schema.title: 地域。
schema.description:
地域。
如果传入了cluster_id，该参数将被忽略。
region_id、cluster_type、profile、cluster_spec、cluster_version五个参数需要同时传入。

schema.title: 集群类型。
schema.description:
集群类型。
如果传入了cluster_id，该参数将被忽略。
region_id、cluster_type、profile、cluster_spec、cluster_version五个参数需要同时传入。

schema.title: 集群子类型。
schema.description:
集群子类型。
如果传入了cluster_id，该参数将被忽略。
region_id、cluster_type、profile、cluster_spec、cluster_version五个参数需要同时传入。

schema.title: 集群规格。
schema.description:
集群规格。
如果传入了cluster_id，该参数将被忽略。
region_id、cluster_type、profile、cluster_spec、cluster_version五个参数需要同时传入。

schema.title: 集群版本。
schema.description:
集群版本。
如果传入了cluster_id，该参数将被忽略。
region_id、cluster_type、profile、cluster_spec、cluster_version五个参数需要同时传入。

schema.title: 集群ID。
schema.description:
集群ID。
指定集群ID时，查询该集群可用的组件列表，此时其他参数将会被忽略。

supported_actions.title:
组件支持的操作，可能的值：
- Install
- Upgrade
- Modify
- Uninstall
supported_actions.description:
组件支持的操作，可能的值：
- Install
- Upgrade
- Modify
- Uninstall

items.description:
组件支持的操作，可能的值：
- Install
- Upgrade
- Modify
- Uninstall

architecture.title:
组件支持的体系结构，可能的值：
- amd64
- arm64
architecture.description:
组件支持的体系结构，可能的值：
- amd64
- arm64

items.description:
组件支持的操作，可能的值：
- Install
- Upgrade
- Modify
- Uninstall

[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "addons": [
    {
      "name": "arms-prometheus",
      "version": "1.1.9",
      "managed": false,
      "install_by_default": false,
      "category": "monitor",
      "config_schema": "{}",
      "supported_actions": [
        "Install"
      ],
      "architecture": [
        "amd64"
      ]
    }
  ]
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<ListAddonsResponse>
    <addons>
        <name>aliyun-acr-credential-helper</name>
        <category>security</category>
        <install_by_default>false</install_by_default>
        <managed>false</managed>
        <version>v21.12.20.0-a6d9879-aliyun</version>
        <supported_actions>Install</supported_actions>
        <supported_actions>Upgrade</supported_actions>
        <supported_actions>Uninstall</supported_actions>
        <architecture>amd64</architecture>
        <config_schema/>
    </addons>
    <addons>
        <name>ack-scheduler</name>
        <category>core</category>
        <install_by_default>true</install_by_default>
        <managed>true</managed>
        <version>v1.26.3-aliyun-5.10-ca3c5b7a</version>
        <supported_actions>Modify</supported_actions>
        <supported_actions>Upgrade</supported_actions>
        <architecture>amd64</architecture>
        <config_schema>{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#",
  "properties": {
    "podMaxBackoffSeconds": {
      "type": "integer",
      "default": 10,
      "minimum": 1,
      "maximum": 100000,
      "describe": "PodMaxBackoffSeconds is the max backoff for unschedulable pods.",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.description.pMBS",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.prompt.pMBS", 
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.validation.pMBS"
    },
    "binpackEnable": {
      "type": "boolean",
      "default": false,
      "describe": "enable the bin packing of resources or not",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.description.binpackEnable",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.prompt.binpackEnable", 
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.validation.binpackEnable"
    },
    "binpackPluginWeight": {
      "type": "integer",
      "default": 100,
      "minimum": 1,
      "maximum": 100000,
      "describe": "weight of binpack plugin when scoring",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.description.binpackPluginWeight",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.prompt.binpackPluginWeight", 
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.validation.binpackPluginWeight"
    },
    "binpackResourceWeight": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "resourceName": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "resource name",
            "default": "",
            "pattern": "^([a-zA-z][a-zA-z0-9\\.\\-\\/]*[a-zA-z0-9])|[a-zA-z]$",
            "maxLength": 254,
            "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.description.binpackResourceWeight.key",
            "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.prompt.binpackResourceWeight.key", 
            "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.validation.binpackResourceWeight.key"
          },
          "resourceWeight": {
            "type": "integer",
            "description": "resource weight",
            "default": 1,
            "minimum": 1,
            "maximum": 10000,
            "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.description.binpackResourceWeight.value",
            "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.prompt.binpackResourceWeight.value", 
            "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.validation.binpackResourceWeight.value"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "connectionQPS": {
      "type": "integer",
      "default": 50,
      "minimum": 1,
      "maximum": 10000,
      "describe": "qps controls the number of queries per second allowed for this connection",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.description.connectionQPS",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.prompt.connectionQPS", 
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.validation.connectionQPS"
    },
    "connectionBurst": {
      "type": "integer",
      "default": 100,
      "minimum": 1,
      "maximum": 10000,
      "describe": "burst allows extra queries to accumulate when a client is exceeding its rate",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.description.connectionBurst",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.prompt.connectionBurst", 
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.validation.connectionBurst"
    },
    "percentageOfNodesToScore": {
      "type": "integer",
      "default": 0,
      "minimum": 0,
      "maximum": 100,
      "describe": "percentage of nodes to score when schedule",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.description.percentageOfNodesToScore",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.prompt.percentageOfNodesToScore", 
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.validation.percentageOfNodesToScore"
    },
    "enableGPUShareScore": {
      "type": "boolean",
      "default": true,
      "describe": "enable the score point of gpushare plugin or not",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.description.enableGPUShareScore",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.description.enableGPUShareScore",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.validation.enableGPUShareScore"
    },
    "loadAwareEnable": {
        "type": "boolean",
        "default": false,
        "describe": "enable the loadaware scheduling feature",
        "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.description.laEnable",
        "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.prompt.laEnable",
        "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.validation.laEnable"
    },
    "loadAwareResourceWeight": {
        "type": "array",
        "items": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "resourceName": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "resource name",
                    "default": "cpu",
                    "enum": ["cpu","memory"],
                    "maxLength": 254,
                    "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.description.laResourceWeight.key",
                    "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.prompt.laResourceWeight.key",
                    "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.validation.laResourceWeight.key"
                },
                "resourceWeight": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "description": "resource weight",
                    "default": 1,
                    "minimum": 1,
                    "maximum": 10000,
                    "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.description.laResourceWeight.value",
                    "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.prompt.laResourceWeight.value",
                    "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.validation.laResourceWeight.value"
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "loadAwareAggregatedUsageAggregationType": {
        "type": "string",
        "description": "usage aggregation type",
        "default": "avg",
        "enum": ["p99", "avg", "p90", "p50", "p95"],
        "maxLength": 254,
        "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.description.aggregationType.value",
        "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.prompt.aggregationType.value",
        "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.ack-scheduler.validation.aggregationType.value"
    }
  },
  "title": "Config",
  "type": "object"
}</config_schema>
    </addons>
    <addons>
        <name>logtail-ds</name>
        <category>monitor</category>
        <install_by_default>false</install_by_default>
        <managed>false</managed>
        <version>v1.8.2.0-aliyun</version>
        <supported_actions>Install</supported_actions>
        <supported_actions>Upgrade</supported_actions>
        <supported_actions>Modify</supported_actions>
        <supported_actions>Uninstall</supported_actions>
        <architecture>amd64</architecture>
        <architecture>arm64</architecture>
        <config_schema>{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#",
  "properties": {
    "LogtailDSLimitCPU": {
      "description": "the cpu limit for Logtail-ds",
      "type": "string",
      "pattern": "(^[1-9][0-9]*$|^0\\.[1-9]$|^[1-9]\\.[0-9]$)",
      "default": "2",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.description.ds.cpulimit",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.prompt.ds.cpulimit",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.validation.ds.cpulimit",
      "x-ui-additional-tips": ""
    },
    "LogtailDSLimitMemory": {
      "description": "the memory limit for Logtail-ds",
      "type": "string",
      "pattern": "(^[1-9][0-9]*$)",
      "default": "2048",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.description.ds.memlimit",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.prompt.ds.memlimit",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.validation.ds.memlimit",
      "x-ui-additional-tips": ""
    },
    "LogtailDSMaxBytePerSec": {
      "description": "the Max Byte Per Second for Logtail-ds",
      "type": "string",
      "pattern": "(^[1-9][0-9]*$)",
      "default": "209715200",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.description.ds.maxbyte",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.prompt.ds.maxbyte",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.validation.ds.maxbyte",
      "x-ui-additional-tips": ""
    },
    "LogtailDSSendRequestConcurrency": {
      "description": "the Send Cocurrency for Logtail-ds",
      "type": "string",
      "pattern": "(^[1-9][0-9]*$)",
      "default": "40",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.description.ds.cocurrency",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.prompt.ds.cocurrency",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.validation.ds.cocurrency",
      "x-ui-additional-tips": ""
    },
    "LogtailDSProcessThreadCount": {
      "description": "the Process Thread Count for Logtail-ds",
      "type": "string",
      "pattern": "^[1-9][0-9]*$",
      "default": "1",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.description.ds.threadcount",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.prompt.ds.threadcount",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.validation.ds.threadcount",
      "x-ui-additional-tips": ""
    },
    "LogtailDSExternalUserDefineIDs": {
      "description": "the user define ids for Logtail-ds",
      "type": "string",
      "pattern": "^.*$",
      "default": "",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.description.ds.userdefineids",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.prompt.ds.userdefineids",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.validation.ds.userdefineids",
      "x-ui-additional-tips": ""
    },
    "LogtailStatefulsetReplicas": {
      "description": "the Replica for Logtail-StatefulSet",
      "type": "string",
      "pattern": "(^0$|^[1-9][0-9]*$)",
      "default": "1",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.description.ss.replica",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.prompt.ss.replica",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.validation.ss.replica",
      "x-ui-additional-tips": ""
    },
    "LogtailStatefulsetLimitCPU": {
      "description": "the cpu limit for Logtail-StatefulSet",
      "type": "string",
      "pattern": "(^[1-9][0-9]*$|^0\\.[1-9]$|^[1-9]\\.[0-9]$)",
      "default": "2",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.description.ss.cpulimit",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.prompt.ss.cpulimit",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.validation.ss.cpulimit",
      "x-ui-additional-tips": ""
    },
    "LogtailStatefulsetLimitMemory": {
      "description": "the memory limit for Logtail-StatefulSet",
      "type": "string",
      "pattern": "(^[1-9][0-9]*$)",
      "default": "2048",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.description.ss.memlimit",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.prompt.ss.memlimit",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.validation.ss.memlimit",
      "x-ui-additional-tips": ""
    },
    "LogtailStatefulsetMaxBytePerSec": {
      "description": "the Max Byte Per Second for Logtail-StatefulSet",
      "type": "string",
      "pattern": "^[1-9][0-9]*$",
      "default": "209715200",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.description.ss.maxbyte",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.prompt.ss.maxbyte",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.validation.ss.maxbyte",
      "x-ui-additional-tips": ""
    },
    "LogtailStatefulsetSendRequestConcurrency": {
      "description": "the SendCocurrency for Logtail-StatefulSet",
      "type": "string",
      "pattern": "^[1-9][0-9]*$",
      "default": "40",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.description.ss.cocurrency",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.prompt.ss.cocurrency",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.validation.ss.cocurrency",
      "x-ui-additional-tips": ""
    },
    "LogtailStatefulsetProcessThreadCount": {
      "description": "the Process Thread Count for Logtail-StatefulSet",
      "type": "string",
      "pattern": "^[1-9][0-9]*$",
      "default": "1",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.description.ss.threadcount",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.prompt.ss.threadcount",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.validation.ss.threadcount",
      "x-ui-additional-tips": ""
    },
    "LogtailStatefulsetExternalUserDefineIDs": {
      "description": "the user define ids for Logtail-StatefulSet",
      "type": "string",
      "pattern": "^.*$",
      "default": "",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.description.ss.userdefineids",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.prompt.ss.userdefineids",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.validation.ss.userdefineids",
      "x-ui-additional-tips": ""
    },
    "SlsMonitoring": {
      "description": "the switch for sls metric components",
      "type": "string",
      "pattern": "^(true|false)$",
      "default": "false",
      "x-ui-description": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.description.fullstack",
      "x-ui-prompt-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.prompt.fullstack",
      "x-ui-validation-message": "cos.k8s.addon.config.logtail-ds.validation.fullstack",
      "x-ui-additional-tips": ""
    }
  },
  "title": "Config",
  "type": "object"
}</config_schema>

    <addons>
        <name>storage-operator</name>

title: 查询可用的组件列表
